entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
